body.name: COOFANDY Men's Casual Shirts Short Sleeve Waffle Knit Button Down Shirt Wrinkle Free Summer Beach Tops
features: More Comfortable -- This casual button down shirts is made of polyester fabric and knitting method, ensuring that our summer shirt is softer, more elastic, wrinkle free, comfortable and skin-friendly. Keeps you cool on hot summer days while absorbing sweat so you always feel good.

New Fashion -- This men knit button down shirts feature classic lapel and button closure. The appearance of the waffle texture leads a new fashion, and the knitted weave gives more elasticity and more breathability. Our clothes are designed to keep you comfortable while not lacking in fashion.

Multiple Matches -- This men's summer short sleeve shirt pairs well with any pants. Wear it with trousers for daily wear, or tuck it into pants for a business casual feel. Paired with shorts, it's perfect for both vacation and leisure. In short, this shirt can create your own fashion sense no matter what it is paired with.

Multiple Occasions -- Whether it is early spring or hot summer, daily activities or outdoor sports, our men's beach shirts can provide you with the matching you want; daily life, business, yoga, leisure, sports, work, home, beach, hawaii, vacation...all allow you to easily create styles that suit different occasions.

Warm Tips -- This men's waffle knit button down shirtt can be machine washed and hand washed, please do not use high temperature water. Please check our size chart carefully before purchasing. If you have any questions about our men's knitted shirts, you can contact us in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Casual Shirt
reviews.reviewText: The COOFANDY Mens Waffle Knit Shirt is perfect for casual or business casual use. The quality of material used is excellent with its 100% polyester that is soft, comfortable, stretchable, and breathable. The texture of this shirt has a waffle design giving it a modern look. The texture reminds me of the thermal long sleeves or pants that is worn in cold weather. The fit of the shirt is "regular" and it fits me quite nice. I don't normally like to wear shirts that are fitted or slim as it makes me feel restricted when I move around. I like shirts that are just a tad bit loose and breathable. As usual, I always wash any brand new shirt in a garment bag in delicate cycle with detergent that is safe for color-fast items and then I hang the shirt to dry. The shirt is advertised as wrinkle-free but it still had a few wrinkles when it was dry. It was not a big deal and it easily straightened out when I used my garment steamer on low setting. Overall, the COOFANDY Men's Waffle Knit Shirt is a great buy. It can be used year round and looks great in either shorts, jeans, or pants. The material is soft, stretchable, and breathable that doesn't feel heavy when worn. The shirt does come with an extra shirt button just in case you loose a button and need to sew one right back in.Advantages:✅ Stylish & Modern Design✅ Soft, Breathable, & Stretchable Material✅ Great for Different OccasionsDisadvantages:⛔️ None

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality knit polo
reviews.reviewText: Nice polo, keep you comfortable day or night warm or cold just remember if your not used to wearing these type of cloths it might be a good idea to purchase a larger size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knotty but Nice
reviews.reviewText: Forget cookie-cutter basics! These knotted shorts from [Brand Name] are anything but ordinary. They're a stylish statement, a breath of fresh air in a sea of boring beachwear.The knotted detail adds a touch of whimsy, like a nautical secret whispered in fabric. I snagged the beige in a medium, and it's the perfect fit - relaxed and comfy without being baggy.Softness is key here. The material feels like a gentle hug against your skin, making it ideal for lazy days by the shore or casual outings with friends. But here's the secret weapon: this fabric is whisper-thin and breathable. It's practically invisible, letting the ocean breeze in and keeping you cool even on the hottest days.Sure, it's a tad transparent, but in the best way possible. It's like the air itself has woven its way into the fabric, keeping you cool and comfortable. Think of it as built-in air conditioning, island style!I've worn these beauties everywhere, from basking on the beach to bumming around town over a pair of jeans. They're the kind of shorts that make you feel effortlessly put-together, like you just rolled out of a magazine shoot and straight onto the sand.So, if you're looking for shorts that are:Stylish and uniqueComfy enough to live inPerfect for hot days and cool vibes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultra Light, Ready for Summer
reviews.reviewText: Whatever Coofandy makes their shirts with it's ultralight and very breathable. It almost feels like you're wearing nothing.This is my 2nd shirt from the same brand and it's a well-made shirt. Besides the material, the cut and sewing is well done. The only oddity is that this is button down, the prior is 1/4 cut, and this one's buttons are set just a little too low. I've got an average torso, literally about the average American male, and the buttons need to be set just a tad bit higher. I guess if I leave the top button undone I'll end up with more chest showing. So...maybe that's not a bad thing :)Regardless, its a well made, crazy thin and breathable material shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So, the texture of this shirt is a nice change from all of the silky-ish polos out there these days. This short sleeved button-down shirt fits right in at barbecues, casual to somewhat dressy evenings out, anywhere you want to look nice and also be comfortable. My husband likes it, even commenting "this is definitely a keeper" and he chose it to take with us on vacation, too. He normally wears a large and the large fits perfectly for him, just a tiny bit of give as he likes to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Another nice garment from Coofandy!
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered several shirts from this company, and they have been uniformly will made, nice looking, and very comfortable. They use blends of synthetic fibers that make them easy to hang dry and nice on the skin. I particularly liked the ribbed look of this shirt, and it hangs and fits well. I also like the color very much. The only thing I was not pleased about was that it says to dry clean on the washing instruction label. I didn't see where that was advertised, and it seems pretty silly to think about dry cleaning a fairly inexpensive and casual shirt. So, I put it in the washing machine and even dried it before wearing it, and it came out looking and feeling just fine. I don't know what that means for its long-term life, and whether the machine washing will eventually take its toll, but so far I'm pleased with the results. None of the other shirts I have bought from this company are dry clean only, so I'm not quite sure what to make of that fact, and hence the four stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Thin/Sheer and Runs Big
reviews.reviewText: I was really looking forward to this shirt based off the pictures of it on the Amazon listing. I was a little disapointed upon receiving it however. The quality of the material is subpar and the shirt is very thin and almost see through. It is also a little bigger then I was expecting. I wear a large, which is what I got, in most polos, t-shirts, and short sleeve button ups and am 5'10 165lbs, but this fit a bit bigger than all of the other larges that I have. I am hoping that it will shrink after a couple washes. Overall, if you want an okay beachy button up this will do but there are better shirts out there as well.
